programme.title: à la folie
programme.desc: Strap in for the ride of your life as we follow surfer Justine Dupont through a ground-breaking big wave season.

programme.title: Gold Coast 2018
programme.desc: Get to know Australia's Gold Coast and the surfers who are there to catch some sick waves.

programme.title: Bells Beach 2018
programme.desc: Australian surfing luminaries weigh in on Mick Fanning's legacy and size up some spots in Victoria.

programme.title: Margaret River 2018
programme.desc: Get the lowdown on Margaret River, as the WSL Championship Tour 2018 reaches its final Aussie leg.

programme.title: Brazil's waves 2018
programme.desc: Catch up with the world's best surfers as they make the most of their time in Saquarema, Brazil.

programme.title: Bali's surf 2018
programme.desc: Lee Wilson takes us on a tour through his day as he heads out on the waves in Bali, Indonesia.

programme.title: Jeffreys Bay 2018
programme.desc: Big names in surfing share the thrill of riding the spectacular waves at Jeffreys Bay, South Africa.

programme.title: Bella Vita
programme.desc: The waves of the Italian coast call surfer Chris Del Moro on a pilgrimage back to his ancestral homeland.

programme.title: For the Dream
programme.desc: Ex-pro surfer Ben Gravy sets out on his dream to become the first person to surf in all 50 US states.

programme.title: Innersection: Black
programme.desc: The 13 sections that form Innersection: Black were each produced by the surfers themselves.

programme.title: Good Times
programme.desc: Watch the Momentum Crew – the established surfing hierarchy –dominate competition and freesurfing.

programme.title: ANYTIME
programme.desc: Follow a new generation of mountain bikers conquering extreme terrain in ANYTIME.

programme.title: Red Bull Valparaíso Cerro Abajo: Livestream
programme.desc: MTB riders fly down steep, narrow streets, navigating ancient buildings in an insane urban downhill race.

programme.title: Stranger than Fiction
programme.desc: Scandal erupts as news leaks that high-performance surfing movies are all just smoke and mirrors.

programme.title: The Wave I Ride
programme.desc: Paige Alms is leading the charge in women's big wave surfing, and she's doing it for all the right reasons..

programme.title: Modern Collective
programme.desc: A vogue group of rogues frame the future of surfing in this wild, progressive and provocative film.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Taylor Steele's high action surf movie defines the cutting edge of performance surfing in the mid-90s.

programme.title: From F1 desert racing to a skatepark in the sky
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from riding a skatepark under a hot air balloon to F1 drivers racing on water.

programme.title: From F1 soapbox racing to breaking world records
programme.desc: Breaking records: all in a day's work! See Baumgartner jump from space, 65 women skydive and a BMXer loop big.

programme.title: From a pinball human to 93kph speed skating
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from speed skating in Norway to BASE jumping from treacherous Mount Everest.

programme.title: From skydiving with skis to flying into a volcano
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from wingsuit flying over an active volcano to skydiving on skis.

programme.title: From a paper plane contest to diving off ruins
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from diving off ancient ruins to acing a paper plane competition.

programme.title: From skateboarding out a plane to 180m wall climb
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from freerunning through an airport to building a skatepark in the forest.

programme.title: From BASE jumping a cave to a flying mega swing
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from slacklining the distance of two soccer fields to BASE jumping into a cave.

programme.title: From freerunning Greek isles to skiing the Streif
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from skiing down the steepest run at night to slacklining during an eclipse.
